title: muttu muttAgavE
sahitya:
muttu muttAgavE murugan guhan aruLAl bhakti isai pozhindAr muttusvAmi dIkSitar


anupallavi

  siddha puruSarAna cidambara yOgiyAl shaktiyin varam prTra sangIta sAgarar


caraNam    shuddha gIrvANamum shruti laya gamakamum sogusAgamEviya sukha ghana vAggEyar
sattiya gAnattAl saguNa pUjai sheidE sAkSAtkAram aDainda dIkSA guru vAzhga
